#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	unsigned long long n;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		if(n==1)
		cout<<1<<endl;
		int i;
		/*while(n>=1)
		{
			n=n/2;
			c++;
		}
		cout<<pow(2,c-1)<<endl;*/
		n=log10(n)/log10(2);
		i=1<<n;
		cout<<i<<endl;;
	}
	return 0;
}
